title: Drawing, "Drawing. Study. Windmill in ruins.  Jamaica, West Indies.", July 1865
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on greenish, darkened to olive brown in places, heavy wove paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at bottom right:  30 to 40 feet high / Old Wind (Breeze) Mill / Jamaica - July //65
description: Vertical view of an old windmill with the conical part in masonry shown with plants and bushes growing on it; a part of a tree in the left foreground; a high bottom margin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing. Study. Windmill in ruins.  Jamaica, West Indies.", July 1865.
July 1865. Graphite, brush and white gouache on greenish, darkened to olive brown in places, heavy wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-14.
